title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-2.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 4-2.1 - Scope

State Regulations

All general hospitals and residential health care facilities as defined in article 28 of the Public Health Law (collectively, "covered facilities") shall comply with this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
4-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
